ctxIETabOptions.description: In the right-click menu, this is the parent item for the context menu that contains the IE Tab sub-menu

ctxOpenIETab.description: Right-click menu item for opening in a new IE Tab

ctxOpenInCurrentTab.description: Right-click menu item for opening the page using IE in the current tab

ctxOptions.description: Right-click context menu item that displays the IE Tab options page

extBrowserActionTooltip.message: Click to display this page in an IE-based tab

extDescription.description: NOTE:  Maximum 132 characters!!!! The description that shows up in the Chrome Web Store
extDescription.message: Display web pages using IE within Chrome. Use Java, Silverlight, ActiveX, Sharepoint, and more. A "Top 10" extension since 2009!

opt_AutoURLExceptionDescription.message: Matching URLs will not be loaded in IE Tab even if they match an Auto URL

opt_CompatDescription.message: If you have IE7 or greater installed, then by default IE Tab emulates IE 7. This feature enables you to emulate different versions of IE.

opt_CompatReadMore.message: Read more about these options at the IE Team Blog

opt_LanguageTest.description: Please put the language code you are translating to here

opt_NotSupported.message: NOT SUPPORTED: The Options page does not work in IE (and therefore won't work in an IE Tab).  You must open it directly in Chrome so it can interact with the IE Tab extension.  Kind of ironic, eh?

opt_OnlyIE8Tip.message: This feature only works if you have IE8+ installed

opt_OnlyIE9Tip.message: This feature only works if you have IE9+ installed

tipBookmarkPage.description: Tooltip on the top UI for bookmarking the current page
tipBookmarkPage.message: Bookmark this page in the 'IE Tab' folder

tipClose.description: Tooltip on the top UI for the close button
tipClose.message: Close IE Tab and open this page in Chrome

tipDocs.description: Tooltip on the top UI for the help button

tipIETabOptions.description: Tooltip on the top UI for invoking the options page
tipIETabOptions.message: Change Auto URLs or other IE Tab settings

tipSearch.description: Tooltip on the top UI for the search box button
